## Installation

You can install the development version of arcana from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r}

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("mtthweklnd/arcana")

```

``` {r}

library(arcana)

the_analyst <- arcana::arcana(
  name = "The Analyst",
  number = 34L,
  emoji = emoji::emoji_name[["computer"]],
  keywords = list(
    upright = c("motivated", "inspired", "dependable"),
    reversed = c("isolated", "trauma", "addiction")
  )
)

the_analyst

```
